comments.body: I didn't mean the newline, I meant all the changes to this file. They seem unrelated to the patch.

Oh I see. Ya, it's somewhat unrelated. Leftovers from https://github.com/flutter/flutter/pull/13195 which added new plugins. We'll just get these diffs if anyone flutter runs on iOS until we check them in.
Interestingly enough I observed cocoapods changing these files when I was experimenting with the xcode build changes and assumed I was doing something wrong. Sounds like that isn't the case?

The SRCROOT -> PODS_ROOT change was
https://github.com/CocoaPods/CocoaPods/commit/f8c09f2b0431f5b82768bc5477b06503899fb152 which looks like it was added in CocoaPods 1.6.0beta1.
The shell script build phase comment was added with CocoaPods 1.3.0beta2
https://github.com/CocoaPods/CocoaPods/commit/f8de0f8a72cb9c5f765638666edf3eb7f5e280ef#diff-241ce887591396cd854a10e604ce5ef6R105
Not sure where the xcconfig additions to the Pod group came from, but I assume also some CocoaPods change.
These changes aren't really important, but it would be nice to locally run those build tests and not have any working changes.
